trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.Adapters" /> namespace contains the base classes for control adapters and page adapters.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.Adapters" /> Przestrzeń nazw zawiera klasy podstawowe dla formantu karty i strony karty.

trans-unit.source: You can use these adapters to override the life-cycle states of pages and controls.
trans-unit.target: Te karty umożliwia zastąpienie stanów cyklu życia stron i kontrolek.

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to modify a control's markup or behavior for new markup standards or for specific browsers.
trans-unit.target: Jest to przydatne, jeśli chcesz zmodyfikować formantu znaczników lub zachowanie dla nowych norm znaczników lub dla przeglądarki.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter> class.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.MenuAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> classes inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
